languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш, добавивший к своим титулам Пустотоходец, вернулся в Комморру — к остаткам кабала Опустошительной бури, который, вопреки ожиданиям, пережил гонения и дождался законного владыку. Новый архонт, невзирая на слухи о причастности к гибели одного из предводителей кабала Черного Сердца, снискал благоволение Векта и уважение Темного города. Уничтожив и поглотив несколько меньших кабалов, Опустошительная буря вновь поднялась к зениту жуткой славы.
languages.translation_comment: Маражай вернул верность кабала по Q2

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.
languages.original_text: Маражай Эзирраеш, добавивший к своим титулам Пустотоходец, вернулся в Комморру — к остаткам кабала Опустошительной бури, который, вопреки ожиданиям, пережил гонения и дождался законного владыку. Новый архонт, невзирая на слухи о причастности к гибели одного из предводителей кабала Черного Сердца, снискал благоволение Векта и уважение Темного города. Уничтожив и поглотив несколько меньших кабалов, Опустошительная буря вновь поднялась к зениту жуткой славы.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who took yet another title of Voidfarer, returned to Commorragh. The Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which, against all expectations, survived persecution and met its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours that connected him to the death of one of the rulers of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained the favour of Vect and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its morbid glory.

Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its morbid glory.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

languages.text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什赢得了“虚空旅者”的头衔之后，再次回到了科摩罗与狂风阴谋团身边。这个阴谋团经历了重重苦难之后，终于迎来了它真正的主人。尽管有传言说，狂风阴谋团的新任执政官与黑心阴谋团的某位执政官的死有直接关联，但他仍然得到了维克特的青睐和黑暗之城的尊重。狂风阴谋团摧毁了几支小型阴谋团，将这些阴谋团的成员尽数吸纳，再次崛起至其邪恶荣耀的巅峰。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什赢得了“虚空旅者”的头衔之后，再次回到了科摩罗与狂风阴谋团身边。这个阴谋团经历了重重苦难之后，终于迎来了它真正的主人。尽管有传言说，狂风阴谋团的新任执政官与黑心阴谋团的某位执政官的死有直接关联，但他仍然得到了维克特的青睐和黑暗之城的尊重。狂风阴谋团摧毁了几支小型阴谋团，将这些阴谋团的成员尽数吸纳，再次崛起至其邪恶荣耀的巅峰。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, der sich den Beinamen Raumfahrer gab, kehrte nach Commorragh zurück, zur Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Die Kabale hatte allen Widrigkeiten zum Trotz überlebt und auf die Ankunft ihres rechtmäßigen Meisters gewartet. Obwohl der Archont Gerüchten zufolge mit dem Tod des Kopfs der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens in Verbindung stand, gewann er Vects Gunst und den Respekt der Dunklen Stadt. Der plündernde Sturm zerstörte und absorbierte mehrere kleinere Kabalen und stieg wieder zum Zenith seines düsteren Ruhms auf.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, der sich den Beinamen Raumfahrer gab, kehrte nach Commorragh zurück, zur Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Die Kabale hatte allen Widrigkeiten zum Trotz überlebt und fand nun ihren rechtmäßigen Meister. Obwohl der Archont Gerüchten zufolge mit dem Tod des Kopfs der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens in Verbindung stand, gewann er die Gunst von Vect und den Respekt der Dunklen Stadt. Der plündernde Sturm zerstörte und absorbierte mehrere kleinere Kabalen und stieg wieder zum Zenith seines morbiden Ruhms auf.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, qui pouvait désormais être considéré comme un voyageur stellaire à part entière, retourna à Commorragh. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, qui avait survécu contre toute attente aux persécutions, l'accueillit pour le reconnaître comme son maître légitime. Le nouvel archonte s'attira les faveurs de Vect et le respect de toute la Cité Crépusculaire, malgré les rumeurs qui l'accusaient d'être impliqué dans la mort d'un dirigeant de la Kabale du Cœur Noir. La Tempête ravageuse détruisit et absorba des Kabales plus faibles jusqu'à retrouver sa gloire sinistre d'autrefois.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, qui pouvait désormais être considéré comme un voyageur stellaire à part entière, retourna à Commorragh. La Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, qui avait survécu contre toute attente aux persécutions, l'accueillit et le reconnut comme son maître légitime. Le nouvel archonte s'attira les faveurs de Vect et le respect de toute la Cité Crépusculaire, malgré les rumeurs qui l'accusaient d'être impliqué dans la mort d'un dirigeant de la Kabale du Cœur Noir. La Tempête ravageuse détruisit et absorba des Kabales plus faibles jusqu'à retrouver sa gloire macabre d'autrefois.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, que añadió el título de viajero del vacío a su nombre, volvió a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora en Commorragh, que, contra todo pronóstico, había sobrevivido a la persecución y esperaba el regreso de su legítimo líder. El nuevo Arconte, a pesar de los rumores que lo relacionaban con la muerte de un gobernante de la Kábala del Corazón Negro, se ganó el favor de Vect y el respeto de la Ciudad Siniestra. Tras destruir y absorber a un número de kábalas menores, la Tempestad Asoladora alcanzó una vez más la cúspide de su gloria siniestra.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, que añadió el título de viajero del vacío a su nombre, volvió a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora en Commorragh, que, contra todo pronóstico, sobrevivió a la persecución y se reunió con su legítimo líder. El nuevo Arconte, a pesar de los rumores que lo relacionaban con la muerte de un gobernante de la Kábala del Corazón Negro, se ganó el favor de Vect y el respeto de la Ciudad Siniestra. Tras destruir y absorber a un número de kábalas menores, la Tempestad Asoladora alcanzó una vez más la cúspide de su gloria mórbida.

languages.text: 虚空渡りという称号を自分の名前に加えたマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、コモラフに戻り、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて迫害を生き延びたリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団に戻り、正当な主人を到来を待った。新アーコンは、コルズ・ヴレックスの支配者の死と関係があるという噂にもかかわらず、ヴェクトの支持と仄暗き都の尊敬を得た。いくつかの小さな陰謀団を破壊し吸収したリーヴィング・テンペストは、再びその不吉な栄光の頂点に立った。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

traits.locale_text: 虚空渡りという称号を自分の名前に加えたマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、コモラフに戻り、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて迫害を生き延びたリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団に戻り、正当な主人に出会った。新アーコンは、コルズ・ヴレックスの支配者の死と関係があるという噂にもかかわらず、ヴェクトの支持と仄暗き都の尊敬を得た。いくつかの小さな陰謀団を破壊し吸収したリーヴィング・テンペストは、再びその病的な栄光の頂点に立った。

languages.text: İsminin yanına Gemici lakabını da alan Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Commorragh'a, tüm imkânsızlıklara rağmen uğradığı zulümlerden sağ çıkmayı başaran ve meşru efendisinin dönüşünü bekleyen Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'na geri döndü. Yeni Arkon, her ne kadar onu Siyah Yürek Kabalı liderinin ölümüyle bağdaştıran söylentiler söz konusu olsa da, Vect'in onayını ve Kara Şehir'in saygısını kazanmayı başardı. Birkaç küçük Kabal yok eden ve onları bünyesine katan Müfteris Kasırga, uğursuz görkeminin zirvesine bir kez daha ulaştı.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, who added the title of Voidfarer to his name, returned to Commorragh, to the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, which had survived persecution against all odds and awaited the coming of its rightful master. The new Archon, despite rumours connecting him to the death of a leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart, gained Vect's favour and the respect of the Dark City. Destroying and absorbing several smaller Kabals, the Reaving Tempest once again rose to the zenith of its sinister glory.

Yeni Arkon, her ne kadar onu Siyah Yürek Kabalı liderinin ölümüyle bağdaştıran söylentiler söz konusu olsa da, Vect'in onayını ve Kara Şehir'in saygısını kazanmayı başardı. Birkaç küçük Kabal yok eden ve onları bünyesine katan Müfteris Kasırga, uğursuz görkeminin zirvesine bir kez daha ulaştı.
